subclassFeature.name: Path of the Dragon
entries: A dragons rage is not to be trifled with, those who follow the dragons path will gain strength beyond even their own comprehention.

subclassFeature.name: Dragon Type
entries: You must choose the draconic lineage you wish to follow

subclassFeature.name: Red
entries: You gain the strength of the red dragon, you are resistant to fire damage.

subclassFeature.name: Blue
entries: You gain the strength of the blue dragon, you are resistant to lighting damage.

subclassFeature.name: Green
entries: You gain the strength of the green dragon, you are resistant to poison damage.

subclassFeature.name: Black
entries: You gain the strength of the black dragon, you are resistant to acid damage.

subclassFeature.name: White
entries: You gain the strength of the white dragon, you are resistant to cold damage.

subclassFeature.name: Gold
entries: You gain the strength of the gold dragon, you are resistant to fire damage.

subclassFeature.name: Silver
entries: You gain the strength of the Silver dragon, you are resistant to cold damage.

subclassFeature.name: Brass
entries: You gain the strength of the Brass dragon, you are resistant to fire damage.

subclassFeature.name: Copper
entries: You gain the strength of the copper dragon, you are resistant to acid damage.

subclassFeature.name: Bronze
entries: You gain the strength of the bronze dragon, you are resistant to lighting damage.

items: You take on the physical qualities of a dragon while you rage.
You grow a tail if you dont have one and enhanced Jaw.
You may make a Bite attack that deals {@dice d8+str} Piercing and {@dice d4} elemental damage as an action.
You may make a sweeping attack with your tail that deals {@dice d6+str} blugeoning damage as a bonus action.

subclassFeature.name: Draconic Attunment
entries: Your Tail attack now deals 2d6+Str Blugeoning damage, and your bite now deals {@dice 2d8+str} piercing and {@dice 2d4} elemental damage.

subclassFeature.name: Intimitading Presence
entries: Starting at 10th level, When you rage you may choose up to 5 creatures within 30 ft of you, Each of them must succeed a DC 8 + Proficiency + Cha Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 min.
At the end of each of its turns the creature can make another Wisdom Save to end the effect.

subclassFeature.name: Draconic Mastery
entries: Your tail attack now deals {@dice 4d6+str} Blugeoning damage and your bite now deals {@dice 2d10+str} Piercing and 2d8 elemental damage.
Once per long rest you may use a breath attack that deals elemental damage, creatures in the range must succeed a breath DC save or take damage, or half as much on a successful one.

subclassFeature.name: Red
entries: At 14th level your breath attack is a 30ft cone that deals {@dice 18d6} fire damage, any creature hit must make a save DC 8 + Proficiency + dex, if they suceed, they take half damage.

subclassFeature.name: Blue
entries: At 14th level your breath attack is a 60ft line that deals {@dice 12d10} lightning damage, any creature hit must make a save DC 8 + Proficiency + dex, if they suceed, they take half damage.

subclassFeature.name: Green
entries: At 14th level your breath attack is a 30ft cone that deals {@dice 16d6} poison damage, any creature hit must make a save DC 8 + Proficiency + con, if they suceed, they take half damage.

subclassFeature.name: Black
entries: At 14th level your breath attack is a 60ft line that deals {@dice 12d8} acid damage, any creature hit must make a save DC 8 + Proficiency + dex, if they suceed, they take half damage.

subclassFeature.name: White
entries: At 14th level your breath attack is a 30ft cone that deals {@dice 13d8} cold damage, any creature hit must make a save DC 8 + Proficiency + con, if they suceed, they take half damage.

subclassFeature.name: Gold
entries: At 14th level your breath attack is a 30ft cone that deals {@dice 18d6} fire damage, any creature hit must make a save DC 8 + Proficiency +dex, if they suceed, they take half damage.
